contentList.content: Intimidate
Make an Intimidation Check against a target's Insight. On a success, the target becomes frightened. Usable only if you have Intimidation proficiency.
Shove (Trip)
Make an Athletics Check against a target's Athletics or Acrobatics. On a success, the target is knocked prone. Usable only if you have Athletics proficiency.
Swap Places
Make an Acrobatics Check against a target's Athletics. On a success, you swap places. Always succeeds on allies. Usable only if you have Acrobatics proficiency.
Feint
Make a Sleight of Hand Check against a target's Perception. On a success, the target becomes Off-Balance until end of turn. Usable only if you have Sleight of Hand proficiency.
Quick Hide
Quickly hide in combat. Usable only if you have Stealth proficiency.
Recall Knowledge (Arcana)

Make a DC 15 Arcana check against an Aberration, Construct, Monstrosity or Ooze. On a success, the target has disadvantage on its saving throws until end of turn. Usable only if you have Arcana proficiency.
Recall Knowledge (History)
Make a DC 15 History check against a Humanoid, Dragon or Giant. On a success, the target has disadvantage on its saving throws until end of turn. Usable only if you have History proficiency.
Recall Knowledge (Nature)
Make a DC 15 Nature check against a Beast, Elemental, Fey or Plant. On a success, the target has disadvantage on its saving throws until end of turn. Usable only if you have Nature proficiency.
Recall Knowledge (Religion)
Make a DC 15 Religion check against a Celestial, Fiend or Undead. On a success, the target has disadvantage on its saving throws until end of turn. Usable only if you have Religion proficiency.
Find Weak Spot (Investigation)
Make an Investigation check against a target's Stealth. On a success, your next attack this turn is a guaranteed critical. Usable only if you have Investigation proficiency.
Handle Animal
Make an Animal Handling check against a Beast's Insight. On a success, the beast becomes dominated by you for a short moment. Usable only if you have Animal Handling proficiency.
Predict
Make an Insight check against a target's Deception. On a success, the target has disadvantage on attacks on its next turn. Usable only if you have Insight proficiency.
Perform First Aid
Make a DC 15 Medicine check on an ally. The ally recovers hit points on a success, and half as many hit points on a failed check. Usable only if you have Medicine proficiency.
Find Weak Spot (Survival)
Make a Survival check against a target's Survival. On a success, your next attack this turn is a guaranteed critical. Usable only if you have Survival proficiency.
Deceive
Make a Deception check against a target's Insight. On a success, the target becomes confused. The target must have some intelligence. Usable only if you have Deception proficiency.
Persuade
Make a Deception check against a target's Insight. On a success, the target becomes charmed. The target must have some intelligence. Usable only if you have Persuasion proficiency.
Taunt
Make a Performance check against a target's Insight. On a success, the target is compelled to attack you. Usable only if you have Performance proficiency.
Knowledge Recalled
You have recalled knowledge about this creature. It has disadvantage on saving throws against you.
Weakness Spotted
Your next attack against the target will be a critical hit.
Predicted
You have predicted your opponent's next move. Its next attacks will be made with disadvantage.
